author: Special Correspondent
text:
The police, on Monday, arrested 12 villagers of Vadavalam near Karambakudi on a charge of instigating violence during an attempt to conduct “jallikattu” at the village on Sunday.

A cross-section of people threw stones and untying one of the bulls at the village, defying the ban.

When police resorted to lathicharge, the people, in their retaliation, damaged the windscreens of a police vehicle.

M. Kalaivani, a police constable, and G. Suresh, a Home Guard, were injured following throwing of stones. The Sembattu Viduthi police, on Monday, registered a case against 12 persons and arrested them.
title: 12 arrested for defying jallikattu ban
